name: Notion Book Tracker
description: Notion Book TrackerKeep track of all your Books in one single place with Notion Book Tracker. I have created this template with Notion beginners in mind, so it is easy and intuitive to use for everyone.This powerful tool will help you keep track of books you’ve read, you’re currently reading, and curate lists of books you want to read in the future.Take a look inside Notion Book TrackerWhat is included in the template?✅ Your own personal Book Shelf to view books in your collection.✅ Books on the
